timeline.message: CLDR-13756 fine tune the unit grammatical features
CLDR-13756 Clean up path header, some test fixes
CLDR-13756 Add test for gender value
CLDR-13756 Add path descriptions, tweak de.xml, catch problem in CheckUnits
CLDR-13756 Tweak the CheckDisplayCollisions to exclude /gender; fix cut and paste error in de.xml
CLDR-13756 Add coverage levels; restrict slavic plurals

timeline.bodyText:
ldml/numbers/minimalPairs/caseMinimalPairs[@gender
from the dtd, this should be
ldml/numbers/minimalPairs/genderMinimalPairs[@gender
timeline.author: pedberg-icu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -103,6 +103,8 @@
 
 ^//ldml/numbers/minimalPairs/ordinalMinimalPairs\[@ordinal="([^"]*)"] ; Minimal pairs for ordinals. For more information, please see http://cldr.org/translation/getting-started/plurals#TOC-Minimal-Pairs.
 ^//ldml/numbers/minimalPairs/pluralMinimalPairs\[@count="([^"]*)"] ; Minimal pairs for plurals (cardinals). For more information, please see http://cldr.org/translation/getting-started/plurals#TOC-Minimal-Pairs.
+^//ldml/numbers/minimalPairs/caseMinimalPairs\[@case="([^"]*)"] ; Minimal pairs for cases used in the language. For more information, please see http://cldr.org/translation/getting-started/plurals#TOC-Minimal-Pairs.
+^//ldml/numbers/minimalPairs/caseMinimalPairs\[@gender="([^"]*)"] ; Minimal pairs for genders. For more information, please see http://cldr.org/translation/getting-started/plurals#TOC-Minimal-Pairs.

timeline.message: CLDR-13756 fix PathDescription.txt as per review
